title: Movement Type Detection
description: Classify the movement pattern of an IMU Sensor: Stationary, Shaking or Circle.
long_description: This project allows you to develop a model capable of differentiating between 3 different movement types, circle, shaking and stationary, based on IMU (6-axis accelerometer and gyroscope) data. The model is suitable for gestures-based applications.
